profileCreation.title: Welcome! Let's Create Your Profile
profileCreation.description: Get started by entering your details. All data is stored locally and won't be uploaded to the internet!

dartsmateWelcome.title: Welcome to Dartsmate!
dartsmateWelcome.description: Your perfect companion for all things darts! Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned pro, Dartsmate is here to enhance your darting experience. Let the matches begin!
